Commands.Rising Wave: 1-HIT melee BRV + 1-HIT magic BRV+HP Attack.  Grants 1 stack of Shadow Dragon for 4 turns.  Turns to Rising Wave+ while Shadow Dragon II is active.  Turns to Rising Wave++ while Shadow Dragon III is active.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon is active.  Shadow Dragon raises Max BRV and Attack based on the number of stacks.
Commands.Rising Wave+: 1-HIT melee BRV + 1-HIT magic BRV+HP Attack + 1-HIT melee (Shadow Dragon) BRV+HP Attack.  Grants 1 stack of Shadow Dragon for 4 turns.  Turns to Rising Wave++ while Shadow Dragon III is active.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon is active.
Commands.Rising Wave++: 2-HIT melee BRV + 2-HIT magic BRV+HP Attack + 2-HIT melee (Shadow Dragon) BRV+HP Attack.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT magic BRV attack + 1-HIT melee (Shadow Dragon) BRV Attack.
Commands.Glare Hand: 1-HIT AoE melee BRV + 1-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack.  HP Damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Grants 1 stack of Shadow Dragon for 4 turns.  Turns to Glare Hand+ while Shadow Dragon II is active.  Turns to Glare Hand++ while Shadow Dragon III is active.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon is active.
Commands.Glare Hand+: 1-HIT AoE melee BRV + 1-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack + 1-HIT AoE melee (Shadow Dragon) BRV+HP attack.  HP Damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Grants 1 stack of Shadow Dragon for 4 turns.  Turns to Glare Hand++ while Shadow Dragon III is active.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon is active.
Commands.Glare Hand++: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV + 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack + 2-HIT AoE melee (Shadow Dragon) BRV+HP attack.  HP Damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.
Commands.Twin Meteor: 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP Attack.  Inflicts Dark Resistance Down for 4 turns.  Follows up with another 5-HIT AoE BRV+HP Attack.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.  Moderately increases BRV damage to a single target.  HP damage is equally divided among all targets.  Grants 3 Stacks of Shadow Dragon for 6 turns.  Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon is active.

Passives.Rising Wave Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rising Wave/+/++.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Glare Hand Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Glare Hand/+/++.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Rising Wave Charge: Increases Rising Wave's max uses by 1.
Passives.Glare Hand Charge: Increases Glare Hand's max uses by 1.
Passives.The Lunarian Descendant: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while Shadow Dragon is active.
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Rising Wave Extend: When using Rising Wave/+/++:- Moderately raises the potency of Golbez and Shadow Dragon's attacks.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% max BRV.- Grants Medium Max BRV Upfor 8 turns.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Glare Hand Extend: When using Glare Hand/+/++:- Moderately raises the potency of Golbez's attacks.- Slightly raises the potency of Shadow Dragon's attacks.- Grants Medium Attack Up for 8 turns.When using BRV Attack+:- Moderately raises the potency of Golbez and Shadow Dragon's attacks.

Weapons.Snowfall Scales CP: 15: Raises the potency of Golbez and Shadow Dragon's attacks when using Rising Wave/+/++.Grants an additional stack of Shadow Dragon.
Weapons.Obsidian Scales CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Twin Meteor.
Weapons.Gilded Scales CP: 35: Raises the potency by Golbez and Shadow Dragon's attacks when using Glare Hand/+/++.Moderately raises BRV damage dealt further to a single target.Grants an additional stack of Shadow Dragon.
